content.text: DuEPublico is the institutional repository of Duisburg-Essen university, Germany. It holds Open Access publications, electronic thesis and dissertations.

dataPolicy.text: The publications and electronic documents provided here must be used according to copyright laws, all rights reserved if not otherwise explicitly specified.

submissionPolicy.text: This repository is intended to hold Open Access publications, electronic thesis and dissertations of Duisburg-Essen university.

eprints.comment: This institutional repository is powered by the MyCoRe repository software, see http://www.mycore.de/ for more information.
